response: Download the Banglalink app from the Play Store or App Store to manage your account, check balance, and access offers.
You can recharge your Banglalink number using mobile banking apps, recharge cards, or through our website.
To check your balance, dial *124# from your Banglalink number.
To explore our internet packages, dial *121# or visit the Banglalink app.
